price: Gyesε yɛwuo a edikan no ara? Na yεntwe y'aso nso?
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
